verses.roman:
jagadānanda haya tāhāṅ, teṅho bhikṣā dibe
sabāre kahiha,--e vatsara keha nā āsibe"

synonyms: jagadānanda—Jagadānanda; haya—is; tāhāṅ—there; teṅho—he; bhikṣā dibe—will give offerings of food; sabāre kahiha—inform all of them; e vatsara—this year; keha nā āsibe—no one should come.
translation: "Jagadānanda is there, and he will give Me offerings of food. Inform them all that no one should come to Jagannātha Purī this year."
